note:
Proud gay autistic or AuDHDer, and likely have ME/CFS, with husband and two kitties. Have many wide interests, especially all things cats (!) but also including photography, the Apple ecosystem, gardening, art, invisible illnesses, well-crafted alt text, accessibility, Deaf issues and community, global awareness, the environment, trans rights, etymology, small business, and pinball. Atheist and vegan.

Former long-time lead software engineer now disabled as noted above along with many other comorbidities. In software development, I was of the rare breed of crossing the chasm between technology and business. Also, I treated well-written software development and documentation as an art form to be continually refined. Most impactful, I was and am a lifetime learner, as is necessary in that field and in a satisfying lifetime for me.

Posts auto-deleted after three months.

#Caturday #BloomScrolling #SilentSunday #Colorado #LGBTQ #Vegan #Vegetarian #Fibromyalgia #ChronicPain #ActuallyAutistic #NoBot #NoBridge
